info.name: Google Calendar - Dark Style
info.description: THIS STYLE IS NO LONGER BEING UPDATED ON THIS SITE. TO CONTINUE TO RECEIVE UPDATES, PLEASE INSTALL THE STYLE FROM THE GITHUB REPO. IMPORTANT: If you would like the Google Bar at the top fully themed on Google Calendar, please install my Google Bar - Dark Style. This style goes nicely with Google Contacts - Dark Style and Google Voice - Dark Style. Credit goes to rry for some code in his Impossibly Clean Google Calendar and riser2's Dark Google Calendar userscript code which I used as the base for this style.
